name: Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies
author: SueAnne McInnis
directions: Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Beat white sugar, 3/4 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer; beat in eggs, 1 at a time, until mixture is smooth
Mix butter mixture into flour mixture and form dough into a ball
Wrap ball with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Roll dough onto a lightly floured surface and cut into shapes using cookie cutters
Arrange cookies on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to brown, about 10 minutes
Cool cookies on the baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
Beat cream cheese, 1/4 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth
Slowly beat confectioners' sugar into cream cheese mixture until icing is smooth; spread onto cooled cookies
